profileAlternative.name: Kumar Aakash
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer | C/C++/Compilers/Program Analysis | Computer Systems | HPC
profileAlternative.summary:
“Everything starts with one step, or one brick, or one word or one day.”

I am an inquisitive, self-motivated and responsible software engineer who thrives on challenges, loves learning new technologies, designing new software and am deeply interested in Compilers, and Programming Languages. I love working with C/C++, Python on the Linux Platform and creating new Systems for the same.

I have worked for 3 years and 8 months in a highly challenging compiler tool-chain development environment at Tata Consultancy Services and have won several accolades for my contribution in Language Processing, Grammars and Compiler Optimization area. I consider creating grammars for languages as my forte and enjoy analyzing programs and extracting information out of them.

I am currently a Graduate Student at Northeastern University and am working as a team member in the Distributed Multi-threaded Transparent Check-pointing Team.


GITHUB : https://github.com/kaakash29

positions.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
positions.description: Developing and Grading projects and assignments for CS3650 and CS5600 - Computer Systems at Northeastern University

positions.title: Compiler Developement Engineer Intern
positions.description:
* Implemented a high level authoring language for LLVM based Simulink Compiler IR.
* Implemented program analysis tools for analyzing the CFG generated,
* Implemented high level optimizations.
* Implemented an XSD-validated XML serialization for a the Simulink Compiler IR.

#Tools and Technologies Used: C++, Perforce and TDD
…

positions.title: Graduate Assistant - Department of Research Computing
positions.location: 2 Ell Hall, Northeastern University. Boston, MA-02120
positions.description:
* Automation of Cluster Configuration, Management and Maintenance tasks.
* Helping researchers from interdisciplinary fields to parallelize and submit jobs on the cluster.
* Data cleaning and exploratory analysis about cluster usage and performance.
* Conducting seminars and helping sessions for users of the cluster.

# Technologies Used : Python, Shell Scripting, Linux, Perl, LSF, Slurm
…

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description:
* Compiler Development and Maintenance,
* Grammar Understanding and Writing,
* Understanding both high level and corresponding machine level instructions
* Creating automation for compiler testing
* Training New Project recruits with Compiler technology
* Reviewing Project Reports and implementation of peer developers

positions.title: Project Intern
positions.description: Worked in the highly competitive environment, with a team of highly skilled developers on a application for the employees of the Citi/TCS Connection.

educations.title: Sikkim Manipal University of Health, Medical and Technological Sciences
educations.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

given.text: Aakash (aka aaku) was a great asset for the team. He used to take responsibility and challenges without being asked. Always active and energetic. Picked up the stuff very quickly in our team and always have solutions ready. I wish him all the best for his future endeavors and I am sure he will do great wherever he go.

received.text: I had the pleasure of starting my career reporting directly to Swetha. She came across as an extremely knowledgeable, highly motivated and result driven leader. She took up new responsibilities and challenged her team members to do the same, driving growth for both individuals as well as the team. Her problem solving skills were immaculate which made her a highly sought after resource in the organization. Given a chance, I would love to work with Swetha again !!
